articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: 5 talking points | SA v India: Kohli equals world record as Proteas reach lowest World Cup ebb
articles.description: Herman Mostert highlights FIVE talking points after South Africa's 243-run Cricket World Cup loss to India at Eden Gardens.
articles.content:
Kohli equals world record
Indian captain Virat Kohli led from the front with a workmanlike century to steer the hosts to a commanding 326/5 off their allotted 50 overs.
It was Kohli's 49th ODI cent… [+82 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Video shows India's iconic monument shrouded in smog  | CNN
articles.description: The air pollution in India is forcing the primary schools to close, cricket players to wear masks in training and many people to stay indoors. CNN’s Michael Holmes has more.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
